name: .LICX File Extension
summary: Learn about .LICX files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Text file that identifies the licensed classes used in a Visual Studio.NET project; links the license files to the corresponding resources listed in the licenses.licx file.

content: Resources include assemblies, controls, components, and other resource types. Visual Studio uses the License Controller (LC.exe) to link the project resources to the appropriate objects. This generates a .LICENSES file used in the assembly process.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
